author: jstrachan
msg: refactored POJO component to use the Registry; so it works easier with JNDI and Spring together with adding a simple JNDI context implementation; also improved the ServiceExporter to be just a simple factory bean.. Finally moved the bean component into camel-core as its not based on Spring (it uses the Registry)
